com.aionemu.commons.log4j
Class JuliToLog4JHandler

java.lang.Object
  java.util.logging.Handler
      com.aionemu.commons.log4j.JuliToLog4JHandler

public class JuliToLog4JHandler
extends java.util.logging.Handler

This class forwards JULI logging requests to Log4j.
List of JULI -> Log4J level mappings.

  • Level.OFF -> Level.OFF
  • Level.SEVERE -> Level.ERROR
  • Level.WARNING -> Level.WARN
  • Level.INFO -> Level.INFO
  • Level.CONFIG -> Level.DEBUG
  • Level.FINE -> Level.DEBUG
  • Level.FINER -> Level.TRACE
  • Level.FINEST -> Level.TRACE
  • Level.ALL -> Level.ALL

Custom levels are passed with the same integer priority.
TODO: Implement better handling of custom levels, we should convert int values of JULI to Log4j int values.

Author:
SoulKeeper

Method Detail

publish

public void publish(java.util.logging.LogRecord record)
Forwards JULI LogRecord to Log4J. This method resolves needed log4j level and fixes caller class issue so methods and lines are correctly displayed by log4j.

Specified by:
publish in class java.util.logging.Handler
Parameters:
record - LogRecord to forward
